channel.title: Brother Sue Bothers You
channel.description:
GO ON! ASK US ANY QUESTION AND WE WILL GIVE THE WORLD'S BEST ANSWER!
When one indian soul meets another the world stops to listen to their chat. Eternal discussions include slang-peppered backstabbing! Political conspiracies are spun from the soiled cuffs! Economic crises, neighborhood scandals and paan-flavoured innuendos tumble out of the great indian consciousness!
Chitchat, the greatest boon of mankind, is an indian invention!
Listen to great, eternal, enlightened duo Brother Sue and Bothers You! Their gift is gab! Their talk is boundless! Their language is indiani, a local version of english!
They aptly put it in their typical indiani, "Grass never grows beneath our feet, babu! And yet we gather no moss, swami!"

item.title: Musical Episode #2: Under the Boardwalk
item.description: CLICK THE GREEN BUTTON BELOW TO PLAY THE EPISODE Our special Musical Episode #2. After encouragement from the listeners the enlightened duo decided to release another special indiani remix. This time it is the classic 'Under the boardwalk!' Here are the lyrics of this tuneful classic: When the sun beats down And burns the tar up on the roof And your shoes get so hot You wish your tired feet were fireproof Under the boardwalk Down by the sea On a blanket with my baby Is where I'll be (Under the boardwalk) Out of the sun (Under the boardwalk) We'll be having some fun (Under the boardwalk) People walking above (Under the boardwalk) We'll be making love (Under the boardwalk, boardwalk) From the park you'll hear The happy sound of a carousel You can almost taste the hot dogs And french fries they sell Under the boardwalk Down by the sea, yeah On a blanket with my baby Is where I'll be (Under the boardwalk) Out of the sun (Under the boardwalk) We'll be having some fun (Under the boardwalk) People walking above (Under the boardwalk) We'll be making love (Under the boardwalk, boardwalk) Oh, under the boardwalk Down by the sea On a blanket with my baby Is where I'll be (Under the boardwalk) Out of the sun (Under the boardwalk) We'll be having some fun (Under the boardwalk) People walking above (Under the boardwalk) We'll be falling in love (Under the boardwalk, boardwalk) UNABLE TO PLAY THE SHOW? Download it to your desktop absolutely free! All shows are less than 800kb each. Right click 'Download' link and click 'Save link as' to save the episode to your desktop! SUBSCRIBE TO OUR SHOWS! item.title: George Bush for Indian President
item.description: CLICK THE GREEN BUTTON BELOW TO PLAY THE EPISODE Comrade Chakra who maintains the blog Comrade Chakra has asked this question "can the wise brothers tell us if George Bush would make a good choice for President of India?" The enlightened duo decide to interview George Bush himself on the occasion of him becoming the Indian president and make him blurt out his true intentions on issues such as technology, terrorism and Sania Mirza. Comrade Chakra blog is part nostalgia and part current affairs ... a sample of current affairs is his latest post on the Ugliest dog competition in the US. The target audience is the Global Indian (global in outlook, physically maybe anywhere, but connected to India). UNABLE TO PLAY THE SHOW? Download it to your desktop absolutely free! item.title: Musical Episode #1: Eels - Need some sleep!
item.description: CLICK THE GREEN BUTTON BELOW TO PLAY THE EPISODE Listen to our special musical episode of our take on a song by Eels. This song was in the soundtrack of Shrek 2. Here are the lyrics to this wonderful song: I need some sleep, You can't go on like this I try counting sheep But there's one i always miss Everyone says:" i'm getting down too low" Everyone says:"you just gotta let it go" You just gotta let it go You just gotta let it go I need some sleep Time to put the old hore down I 'm in too deep And the wheels keep spining round Everyone says:"i'm getting down too low Everyone says:" you just gotta let it go" You just gotta let it go You just gotta let it go You just gotta let it go You just gotta let it go ......end...... UNABLE TO PLAY THE SHOW? Download it to your desktop absolutely free! All shows are less than 800kb each. Right click 'Download' link and click 'Save link as' to save the episode to your desktop!

item.title: How to use toilets in America?
